title: Senior eCommerce Virtual Assistant – Order Processing & Supplier Coordination
job_overview:
We are looking for a highly experienced, detail?oriented, and proactive Senior eCommerce Virtual Assistant to join our team.
This is not an entry?level role — we are seeking someone with solid, proven experience in eCommerce operations, order management, and supplier coordination across multiple platforms.
You will play a critical role in ensuring the smooth flow of orders, accurate financial processing, and timely communication with both suppliers and customers.

Key Responsibilities
You will work closely with management and handle end?to?end operational tasks, including:

Order & PO Management

Track and maintain order status in a shared Google file.

Create and process sales orders from non?Shopify platforms (e.g. Bunnings, Kogan, Harvey Norman, eBay) in Xero.

Process all orders in Xero and generate purchase orders (POs).

Check supplier websites for stock availability and freight charges before creating POs.

Send POs to suppliers or place orders directly on supplier portals.

Update POs with supplier invoices in Xero and process payments accurately.

Logistics & Updates

Follow up on shipment notifications and tracking numbers for all POs.

Update sales orders and tracking information on the relevant platforms and in Xero.

Customer & Supplier Communication

Handle email and phone inquiries promptly and professionally.

Coordinate with suppliers for stock, pricing, and shipping details.

Product & Pricing Updates

Update supplier product and pricing information on the website and across sales channels.

Requirements
Minimum 3 years of proven experience in eCommerce order management, supplier coordination, and multi?channel operations.

Proficiency with Shopify and Xero (or similar accounting/order platforms).

Strong understanding of purchase orders, invoicing, and tracking processes.

Excellent written and spoken English.

Proven ability to work independently, follow SOPs, and meet deadlines.

High attention to detail and accuracy.

Stable internet connection and reliable computer setup.

Preferred Skills (Bonus Points)
Prior experience handling suppliers in AU, US, or other international markets.

Experience with multi?marketplace management (e.g. Kogan, eBay, Amazon).

Advanced skills in Google Sheets or Excel for reporting.

What We Offer
Long?term stable position with a growing international eCommerce brand.

Competitive salary based on experience.

Opportunity for growth into leadership or specialist roles.

Supportive remote team environment and structured training.


How to Apply
Send your application with:

A short introduction and why you’re the best fit for this role.

A summary of your proven experience in eCommerce operations (include years and platforms handled).

Examples of previous tasks you’ve handled that match the responsibilities above.

Your expected monthly salary in PHP.

Your availability (start date and preferred working hours).
